TopicTitle: Medium survey unit will not "click" to OKTO

Articles.Content:
Medium survey unit will not "click" to OKTO, what am I doing wrong? surver unit will click to bottom green circle !

![46bkCNW.png](http://i.imgur.com/46bkCNW.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-25T01:11:49Z" title="07/25/2015 01:11  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 25, 2015</time> by Lohan2008**
Since kethane is an old mod, its nodes are not ready for KSP's new attachment system yet.

> 
> Since kethane is an old mod, its nodes are not ready for KSP's new attachment system yet.

How long til it will work? (yes, I know: how long is a piece of string)

It might not be changed in Kethane. That mod is seeing no maintenance beyond recompiling the dll against new KSP versions.

There are two workarounds for any part with this problem. Either attach it the wrong way up then rotate it using the gizmo, or go into the cheat menu and select non-strict orientation checks.
Seeing as I probably will not be using Kethane, it will not make a difference. (I have been in-activite for 2 months)

> 
> Seeing as I probably will not be using Kethane, it will not make a difference. (I have been in-activite for 2 months)

Have you tried with the stock scanning and ISRU items?

> 
> Have you tried with the stock scanning and ISRU items?

 As I have said, been away for 2 months, have to re-learn part/s.
